lead_paragraph: Donald Trump on Monday defended his Trump University as a booming success for student entrepreneurs and blasted New York's attorney general, who called it a scam.

headline.main: Trump Calls NY Attorney General a 'Political Hack'
headline.print_headline: Trump Calls NY Attorney General a 'Political Hack'

snippet: Donald Trump on Monday defended his Trump University as a booming success for student entrepreneurs and blasted New York's attorney general, who called it a scam....
